Package freedays.app

Class Summary
AppStrategL1 Approval strategy describing a request to the immediate superior.
AppStrategLTop Approval strategy describing a request to the highest superior in the hierarchy.
FDAdmin Class describing a FreeDay administration role.
FDUser Class describing a specific FreeDay user.
FreeDay Abstract class representing a Request object for the FreeDay context.
FreeDayC Class that represents a TypeC free day request.
FreeDayFactory Factory used for creation of FreeDay child based on their type.
FreeDayL Class representing a TypeL free day request.
FreeDayR Class that represents a TypeR free day request.
FreeDaysRCMatch Class used to extract the common behavior exhibited during the matching process of two objects matchable objects.
FreeDayVacation Class representing a TypeV request.
HRManagement Class describing a FreeDay human resources manager role.
 

Enum Summary
FreeDay.FreeDayStatus Describes the states in which a FreeDay object can be.
FreeDayVacation.ConfidenceLevel Describes the priority of the request.
RequestStatus Describe the possible status values form a Request - CANCELED/GRANTED/REJECTED status should be on position n-2/n-1/n - ideal situation = one status for each granter involved in the approval strategy
